roleset.name: reflex caused by oject in mouth

example.name: bound and gagged
example.text: [Imette 's hands and feet]-1 were bound *-1 and [her mouth]-3 gagged *-3 with a white athletic sock.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'gag' based on survey of sentences in ebc. Verbnet classes 9.9 and 42.3; other framed members include blanket, cloak, frame, harness, poison, stress, water; choke, kill, muzzle, repress, smother.
